page.title: 11RECREATION IN MAWNAN
page.content: People living in Mawnan enjoy spending their leisure time partaking in a wide variety of{sports}activities.There are many well established sports like {Cricket}which has 4 teams to cater for all ages.The 2 Mawnan{football}teams have had quite a successful year. Mawnan has a{Bowls}Club which caters mainly caters for the older people.There are many chances for water sports for locals and tourists like{windsurfing}and{sailing}.There is a sailing club for Optimists in the Helford river for younger people. There is a new{Tennis}Club at Trebah. Mawnan{Angling}Club fish locally for mackeral, bass and pollack. There is a {Judo}Club for the locals.A dancing teacher takes{dancing}lessons. There are{Darts}teams at the Red Lion and a {Snooker}Club at the hall.A{Netball Club is run for mums at school.
